a.xlink:title: Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State start
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.noHeatReq.idleNotHeat
start to heatingSystem
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.start
start to house.house
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.start
start to house.room.room
start to house.room.room.noHeatReq
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.noHeatReq.start
start to house.room.room.noHeatReq.idleNotHeat
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat
From house.room.room.noHeatReq.idleNotHeat to house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat automatically Guard: [(setTemp - actualTemp) > 2]:g1 Transition Action: valvePos++; waitedForWarm = 0;
From house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat to house.room.room.noHeatReq.idleNotHeat automatically Guard: [((setTemp - actualTemp) <= 2)]:g4
From house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat to house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat automatically Guard: [waitedForWarm < warmUpTimer]:g2 Transition Action: waitedForWarm++;

From house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat to house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat automatically Guard: [(valvePos != 2) && (waitedForWarm == warmUpTimer)]:g3 Transition Action: valvePos++; waitedForWarm = 0;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.heatReq.idleHeat

From house.room.room.noHeatReq.waitForHeat to house.room.room.heatReq automatically Guard: [(waitedForWarm == warmUpTimer) && (valvePos == 2) && ((setTemp - actualTemp) > 2)]:g5 Transition Action: requestHeat = true;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.heatReq.start
start to house.room.room.heatReq.idleHeat
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool
From house.room.room.heatReq.idleHeat to house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool automatically Guard: [(actualTemp - setTemp) > 2]:g6 Transition Action: valvePos--; waitedForCool = 0;

From house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool to house.room.room.noHeatReq automatically Guard: [(valvePos == 0) && (coolDownTimer == waitedForCool) && ((actualTemp - setTemp) > 2)]:g8 Transition Action: requestHeat = false;
From house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool to house.room.room.heatReq.idleHeat automatically Guard: [((actualTemp - setTemp) <= 2)]:g10

From house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool to house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool automatically Guard: [(valvePos != 0) && (coolDownTimer == waitedForCool)]:g7 Transition Action: valvePos--; waitedForCool = 0;
From house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool to house.room.room.heatReq.waitForCool automatically Guard: [waitedForCool < coolDownTimer]:g9 Transition Action: waitedForCool++;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.start
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.off
start to house.controller.controller
start to house.controller.controller.off
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.controllerOn.idle
From house.controller.controller.off to house.controller.controller.controllerOn on heatSwitchOn
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.controllerOn.start
start to house.controller.controller.controllerOn.idle
From house.controller.controller.controllerOn to house.controller.controller.off on heatSwitchOff Transition Action: deactivate = true;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.actHeater
From house.controller.controller.controllerOn.idle to house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive automatically Guard: [requestHeat == true]:g11 Transition Action: activate = true;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.error
From house.controller.controller.controllerOn to house.controller.controller.error on furnaceFault
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.start
start to house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.actHeater
From house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive to house.controller.controller.controllerOn.idle automatically Guard: [requestHeat == false]:g12 Transition Action: deactivate = true;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.heaterRun
From house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.actHeater to house.controller.controller.controllerOn.heaterActive.heaterRun automatically Guard: [furnaceRunning == true]:g13
From house.controller.controller.error to house.controller.controller.off on userReset Transition Action: furnaceReset = true;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.start
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceOff
start to furnace.furnace
start to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.start
start to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceOff
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceOff to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct automatically Guard: [activate == true]:g15 Transition Action: furnaceStartUpTime = 0;
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.furnaceErr
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal to furnace.furnace.furnaceErr on furnaceFault
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceOff automatically Guard: [deactivate == true]:g16
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct automatically Guard: [furnaceStartUpTime < furnaceTimer]:g17 Transition Action: furnaceStartUpTime++
Class HeatControlSystem, SM sm, State furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceRun
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceAct to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceRun automatically Guard: [furnaceStartUpTime == furnaceTimer]:g18 Transition Action: furnaceRunning = true;
From furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceRun to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal.furnaceOff automatically Guard: [deactivate == true]:g16
From furnace.furnace.furnaceErr to furnace.furnace.furnaceNormal automatically Guard: [furnaceReset == true]:g14
